Ah, thanks for the detailed list, really love playing Morde out of all the listed but I guess old Aatrox was fun too. Thanks for the list!
At current it's Vladimir. He's the only true drain tank. Other than that, it's proven to be such an unhealthy play mechanic that they've been hard pressed to make more.

Vladimir isn't even a drain tank.

He depends on the healing from his Q because his only wave clear ability makes him take 2 bloodrazor passives to the face.

A majority of vlads nowadays build full AP with no CDR. That means his Q is on a 5 second cooldown. You are not drain tanking with that.
Anyone can be a drain tank because anyone can build lifesteal and attack speed.
